movies.title: Kun shou
movies.plot: Three burglars panicked when they ran into a team of police by accident. During their escape, they accidentally killed a policeman. Holed up in a bar, they took the people inside hostage. But unbeknown to them, one of the hostages was a criminal wanted by the cops.
movies.simplePlot: Three burglars panicked when they ran into a team of police by accident. During their escape, they accidentally killed a policeman. Holed up in a bar, they took the people inside hostage. ...

biography.bio: Julian Cheung was born on August 27, 1971 in Hong Kong. He is an actor, known for B gai waak (1998), Bong ga (2007) and Chuet sik san tau (2001). He is married to Anita Yuen. They have one child.
biography.name: Julian Cheung

biography.bio: Michael Wong has managed to become a star of Asian cinema in Hong Kong despite not even speaking a word of Chinese Cantonese, and he had no training in martial arts; in Asia, the actor known for his starring role in action film Final Option (1994) and Fei hu (1996) where he plays a cop; for First Option the actor was nominated at the Hong Kong Film Awards, the Oscar of Hong Kong cinema, and later starred in a myriad of productions and movies oriental, often unpublished in the the West such as Yeshou xingjing (1998)_, which is considered one of the most successful films of Hong Kong cinema; actor took part but also in many U.S. films such as Niki Larson (1993) starring opposite Jackie Chan,Piège à Hong Kong (1998) with 'Jean Claude Van Damme', and the film Cold War (2012), and soon we will see the actor in the italian film The Mercury Conspiracy (2013) with Luca Barbareschi.
biography.name: Michael Wong

biography.bio: Kenny Bee was born on February 23, 1952 in Hong Kong. He is known for his work on Shanghai Blues (1984), Initial D (2005) and The Story of a Small Town (1979). He was previously married to Teresa Cheung.
biography.name: Kenny Bee

biography.bio: Simon Yeung is an actor, known for Kun shou (2001) and Wan chai express (1999).
biography.name: Simon Yeung

biography.bio: Roy Cheung was born on July 20, 1963 in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony as Yiu-Yeung Cheung. He is an actor, known for In the Mood for Love (2000), The mission (1999) and Exilé (2006).
biography.name: Roy Cheung

biography.bio: Christine Ng was born on February 24, 1969. She is an actress, known for Rush Hour (1998), Crime story (1993) and 9413 (1998). She has been married to Kasey Lin Hoi Tong since July 1999.
biography.name: Christine Ng

biography.bio: Ng Sui Ting is an actor, known for Kun shou (2001).
biography.name: Ng Sui Ting

biography.bio: Timothy Zao Chen Yung is an actor, known for Kun shou (2001).
biography.name: Timothy Zao Chen Yung

biography.bio: Ricky Fan is an actor and writer, known for Happy Funeral (2008), You Shoot, I Shoot (2001) and Xi ai ye pu (2011). He has been married to Sze-yan Lee since December 8, 2011.
biography.name: Ricky Fan

biography.bio: Kai Cheung Leung is an actor, known for Push (2009), Escape from Hong Kong Island (2004) and Kun shou (2001).
biography.name: Kai Cheung Leung
